attributeReference.name: chartOfAccountsCode
attributeReference.description: The code that identifies the Chart of Accounts for an Account. It is part of the primary key. Kuali accommodates more than one Chart of Accounts.

attributeReference.name: chartOfAccounts.codeAndDescription
attributeReference.label: Chart Code
attributeReference.description: Chart Code and Description

attributeReference.name: endowmentIncomeChartOfAccounts.codeAndDescription
attributeReference.label: Endowment Chart of Accounts Code
attributeReference.description: Endowment Chart Code and Description

attribute.name: accountNumber
attribute.label: Account Number
attribute.description: Identifier for a pool of funds assigned to a specific university entity for a specific function.

attribute.name: accountName
attribute.label: Account Name
attribute.description: The familiar title of a specific Account.

attributeReference.name: organizationCode
attributeReference.description: The code used to represent an organization.

attributeReference.name: organization.codeAndDescription
attributeReference.label: Organization Code
attributeReference.description: Organization Code and Description

attributeReference.name: accountTypeCode
attributeReference.label: Acct Type Code
attributeReference.description: An additional attribute to describe the purpose of an Account

attributeReference.name: accountPhysicalCampusCode
attributeReference.description: The code for the physical campus of the institution on which the Account is located.

attributeReference.name: subFundGroupCode
attributeReference.label: Sub-Fund Group Code
attributeReference.description: The code used to categorize Accounts for internal resource management, and to relate the Account to a Fund through the Sub-Fund Groups.

attributeReference.name: subFundGroup.codeAndDescription
attributeReference.label: Sub-Fund Group Code
attributeReference.description: Sub-Fund Group Code and Description

attributeReference.name: programCode
attributeReference.label: Program Code
attributeReference.description: The program code for this account.

attributeReference.name: program.codeAndDescription
attributeReference.label: Program Code
attributeReference.description: Program Code and Description

attributeReference.name: accountsFringesBnftIndicator
attributeReference.label: Account Fringe Benefit
attributeReference.description: A checkbox that indicates if employee benefit expenses will be charged to the Account.

attribute.name: financialHigherEdFunctionCd
attribute.label: Financial Higher Education Function Code
attribute.description: The code that indicates the specific purpose of the activities recorded in the Account.

attributeReference.name: financialHigherEdFunction.codeAndDescription
attributeReference.label: Higher Ed Function Code
attributeReference.description: Higher Ed Function Code

attributeReference.name: accountRestrictedStatusCode
attributeReference.label: Account Restricted Status Code
attributeReference.description: The code for the status of usage restrictions on funds in the Account.

attributeReference.name: accountRestrictedStatusDate
attributeReference.label: Account Restricted Status Date
attributeReference.description: The date on which funds become unrestricted, if the Account Restricted Status Code is "T - Temporarily Restricted".

attribute.name: accountCityName
attribute.label: Account City Name
attribute.description: The city in which the account is managed.

attributeReference.name: accountStateCode
attributeReference.label: Account State Code
attributeReference.description: A 2-character code for the state in which the Account is managed.

attributeReference.name: accountState.codeAndDescription
attributeReference.label: Account State Code
attributeReference.description: Account State Code and Description

attribute.name: accountStreetAddress
attribute.label: Account Street Address
attribute.description: The street address where the Account is managed. It is also the location to which standard financial reports are to be sent.

attributeReference.name: accountZipCode
attributeReference.label: Account Postal Code
attributeReference.description: The Zip code assigned by the US Postal Service for the city in which the Account is managed.

attributeReference.name: reportsToChartOfAccountsCode
attributeReference.label: Fringe Benefit Chart Of Accounts Code
attributeReference.description: The code for the Chart of Accounts for the employee benefits Account, i.e., the Account that records the employee benefits applicable to the salaries recorded in the original Account.

attributeReference.name: reportsToAccountNumber
attributeReference.label: Fringe Benefit Account Number
attributeReference.description: The numeric identification for the Account to which employee benefits will be charged, related to the salaries recorded in the original Account.

attributeReference.name: accountCreateDate
attributeReference.label: Account Create Date
attributeReference.description: Account Create Date

attributeReference.name: accountEffectiveDate
attributeReference.label: Account Effective Date
attributeReference.description: The date on which the Account became effective. Use the calendar icon to select and format the date.

attributeReference.name: accountExpirationDate
attributeReference.label: Account Expiration Date
attributeReference.description: The date on which the Account expires and will no longer accept transactions. Use the calendar icon to select and format the date.

attributeReference.name: continuationFinChrtOfAcctCd
attributeReference.label: Continuation Chart Of Accounts Code
attributeReference.description: The code for the Chart of Accounts for the Continuation Account. It will accept transactions after the original account has expired.

attributeReference.name: continuationAccountNumber
attributeReference.label: Continuation Account Number
attributeReference.description: The numeric identifier for the Continuation Account. It will accept transactions after the original account has expired.

attributeReference.name: endowmentIncomeAcctFinCoaCd
attributeReference.label: Endowment Chart Of Accounts Code
attributeReference.description: The code for the Chart of Accounts for the Account when the Account is related to an Endowment.

attributeReference.name: endowmentIncomeAccountNumber
attributeReference.label: Endowment Account Number
attributeReference.description: The numeric identifier for the Account when the Account is related to an Endowment.

attributeReference.name: contractControlFinCoaCode
attributeReference.label: Contract Control Chart of Accounts Code
attributeReference.description: The code for the Chart of Accounts for the Contract Control Account. It is the account with primary spending authority for a contract that has been assignment multiple accounts in the system, and it is the account out of which most of the reporting will be done. It represents more fully than any other account the full functionality of the project and its corresponding expenditures and revenues.

attributeReference.name: contractControlAccountNumber
attributeReference.label: Contract Control Account Number
attributeReference.description: The numeric identifier for the Contract Control Account. It is the account with primary spending authority for a contract that has been assignment multiple accounts in the system, and it is the account out of which most of the reporting will be done. It represents more fully than any other account the full functionality of the project and its corresponding expenditures and revenues.

attributeReference.name: incomeStreamFinancialCoaCode
attributeReference.label: Income Stream Chart Of Accounts Code
attributeReference.description: The code for the Chart of Accounts for the Income Stream Account. It is the account that is linked to receive any offsetting entries, in order to balance responsibility center activity.

attributeReference.name: incomeStreamAccountNumber
attributeReference.label: Income Stream Account Number
attributeReference.description: The numeric identifier for the Income Stream Account. It is the account that is linked to receive any offsetting entries, in order to balance responsibility center activity.

attributeReference.name: acctIndirectCostRcvyTypeCd
attributeReference.label: Account Indirect Cost Recovery Type Code
attributeReference.description: The code for a particular Indirect Cost Recovery base. The "type" contains Object Codes that are excluded from indirect cost charges.

attributeReference.name: acctIndirectCostRcvyType.codeAndDescription
attributeReference.label: Account Indirect Cost Recovery Type Code
attributeReference.shortLabel: Account Indirect Cost Recovery Type Code
attributeReference.description: Account Indirect Cost Recovery Type Code and Description

attributeReference.name: acctCustomIndCstRcvyExclCd
attributeReference.label: Account Customized Indirect Cost Exclusion Code
attributeReference.description: Account Customized Indirect Cost Exclusion Code

attribute.name: financialIcrSeriesIdentifier
attribute.label: Financial Series ID
attribute.description: The numeric identifier for the record in the Automated Indirect Cost Recovery table that will be used to determine indirect cost percentage and income account(s).

attributeReference.name: indirectCostRcvyFinCoaCode
attributeReference.label: Indirect Cost Recovery Chart Of Accounts Code
attributeReference.description: The code for the Chart of Accounts for the Indirect Cost Recovery (ICR) Account. It is the account that receives the credit for the Indirect Cost Recovery.

attributeReference.name: indirectCostRecoveryAcctNbr
attributeReference.label: Indirect Cost Recovery Account Number
attributeReference.description: The numeric identifier for the Indirect Cost Recovery (ICR) Account. It is the account that receives the credit for the Indirect Cost Recovery.

attributeReference.name: accountInFinancialProcessingIndicator
attributeReference.label: Account In Financial Processing
attributeReference.description: Account In Financial Processing

attributeReference.name: budgetRecordingLevelCode
attributeReference.label: Budget Record Level Code
attributeReference.description: The code for the level at which a budget is recorded in the Account.

attributeReference.name: accountSufficientFundsCode
attributeReference.label: Account Sufficient Funds Code
attributeReference.description: The code for the level at which the account is going to be checked for sufficient funds in the transaction processing environment.

attributeReference.name: pendingAcctSufficientFundsIndicator
attributeReference.label: TP Sufficient Funds Check
attributeReference.description: A checkbox that indicates whether or not sufficient funds checking is turned on within the Kuali application. It may be desirable to set the sufficient funds code to a value other than N but leave this box unchecked if there is a need for other applications to use the sufficient funds table but sufficient funds checking is not desired in Kuali.

attributeReference.name: extrnlFinEncumSufficntFndIndicator
attributeReference.label: External Encumbrance Sufficient Funds Indicator
attributeReference.description: A checkbox that indicates if the Account will include external encumbrances in calculating sufficient funds.

attributeReference.name: intrnlFinEncumSufficntFndIndicator
attributeReference.label: Internal Encumbrance Sufficient Funds Indicator
attributeReference.description: A checkbox that indicates if the Account will include internal encumbrances in calculating sufficient funds.

attributeReference.name: finPreencumSufficientFundIndicator
attributeReference.label: Pre-Encumbrance Sufficient Funds Indicator
attributeReference.description: A checkbox that indicates if the Account will include pre-encumbrances in calculating sufficient funds.

attributeReference.name: financialObjectivePrsctrlIndicator
attributeReference.label: Object Presence Control Indicator
attributeReference.description: A checkbox that indicates if the Account will use presence control, i.e., sufficient funds checking by Object Code.

attribute.name: cgCatlfFedDomestcAssistNbr
attribute.label: Code Of Federal Domestic Assistance Number
attribute.description: Numeric identifier for the federal government sources for awards. The label is required for the Audit of Federal Domestic Assistance conducted under OMB regulation A-133.

attributeReference.name: accountOffCampusIndicator
attributeReference.label: Account Off Campus Indicator
attributeReference.description: A checkbox that indicates the activity represented by the Account occurs off campus.

attribute.name: accountClosedIndicator
attribute.label: Closed?
attribute.description: A checkbox that indicates the Account is closed and can no longer accept transactions.

attributeReference.name: accountFiscalOfficerUser.personUserIdentifier
attributeReference.label: Fiscal Officer UserID
attributeReference.description: The username of the Fiscal Officer for the Account. Fiscal Officers are responsible for the accuracy of transactions in the Account. All transaction documents route to Fiscal Officers or their delegates.

attributeReference.name: accountFiscalOfficerUser.personName
attributeReference.label: Fiscal Officer Name
attributeReference.description: The Name of the Fiscal Officer.

attributeReference.name: accountSupervisoryUser.personUserIdentifier
attributeReference.label: Account Supervisor UserID
attributeReference.description: The username of the Account Supervisor. Account Supervisors generally provide the Account leadership role, which may consist of general oversight, approval of the budget, and/or establishing the "big picture".

attributeReference.name: accountSupervisoryUser.personName
attributeReference.label: Account Supervisor Name
attributeReference.description: The Name of the Account Supervisor.

attributeReference.name: accountManagerUser.personUserIdentifier
attributeReference.label: Account Manager UserID
attributeReference.description: The username of the Account Manager. Account Managers generally provide the account management role for the Account. They develop or establish the account budget, determine how funds are being spent, and monitor the remaining balance.

attributeReference.name: accountManagerUser.personName
attributeReference.label: Account Manager Name
attributeReference.description: The Name of the Account Manager.

attributeReference.name: accountGuideline.accountExpenseGuidelineText
attributeReference.label: Account Expense Guideline Text
attributeReference.description: A free-form text field that describes the expense guideline for the Account.

attributeReference.name: accountGuideline.accountIncomeGuidelineText
attributeReference.label: Account Income Guideline Text
attributeReference.description: A free-form text field that describes the income guideline for the Account.

attributeReference.name: accountGuideline.accountPurposeText
attributeReference.label: Account Purpose Text
attributeReference.description: A free-form text field that describes the institutional purpose of the Account.

attributeReference.name: accountDescription.campusDescription
attributeReference.description: A free-form text field that identfies the Campus of the Account.

attributeReference.name: accountDescription.organizationDescription
attributeReference.description: A free-form text field that describes the Organization responsible for the Account.

attributeReference.name: accountDescription.responsibilityCenterDescription
attributeReference.description: A free-form text field that identifies the Responsibility Center to which the Organization of the Account belongs.

attributeReference.name: accountDescription.campusCode
attributeReference.description: The code that identifies the Campus on which the Organization of the Account is located.

attributeReference.name: accountDescription.buildingCode
attributeReference.description: The code that identifies the Building in which the Organization of the Account is located.

attribute.name: accountResponsibilitySection
attribute.label: ACCOUNT RESPONSIBILITY SECTION
attribute.description: Dummy attribute to divide sections on Inquiry page.

attribute.name: contractsAndGrantsSection
attribute.label: CONTRACTS AND GRANTS SECTION
attribute.description: Dummy attribute to divide sections on Inquiry page.

attribute.name: guidelinesAndPurposeSection
attribute.label: GUIDELINES AND PURPOSE SECTION
attribute.description: Dummy attribute to divide sections on Inquiry page.

attribute.name: accountDescriptionSection
attribute.label: ACCOUNT DESCRIPTION SECTION
attribute.description: Dummy attribute to divide sections on Inquiry page.

collection.name: subAccounts
collection.label: Sub-Accounts
collection.description: accounts with some hierarchical subrelationship to this one
